featured.text: We believe that with your intelligence and hard work, you will pass the exam without any difficulty.
I am studying so hard for the forthcoming entrance exam that I do not have the of a free weekend to rest.
J.…is why John failed in this exam.
Belle was the person (D) … he will fail the exam.

definition.zh_def: 考試，通常用來評估學生的知識或技能。
definition.en_def: A test of a person's knowledge or proficiency in a subject or skill.
definition.example: She studied hard for her math exam.
